attributes.description: Styles and designations that apply generally to various types of clothing. Examples include Casual, Dressy, Loungewear, and Streetwear.
Terms that describe the way a garment will fit when worn, such as Active Fit, Baggy Fit, Curvy Fit, Modern Fit, Oversized, Relaxed Fit, Skinny, Slim, and Tailored.

summary: The page outlines mandatory attributes for Traditional Garment Product Type Items, emphasizing the importance of adhering to guidelines regarding Clothing Style and Clothing Fit to avoid validation failures in publishing.
